00057   // template class Morton
00075   template <typename THashKey, typename TPoint >
00076   class Morton
00077   {
00078   public:
00079     typedef THashKey HashKey;
00080     typedef TPoint Point;
00081     typedef typename Point::Coordinate Coordinate;
00082     static const Dimension dimension = Point::dimension;    
00083 
00084     BOOST_CONCEPT_ASSERT(( CUnsignedInteger<THashKey> ));
00085     BOOST_CONCEPT_ASSERT(( CInteger<Coordinate> ));
00086 
00091     Morton();
00092     
00098     void interleaveBits(const Point  & aPoint, HashKey & output) const;
00099 
00100 
00110     HashKey keyFromCoordinates(const std::size_t treeDepth, const Point & coordinates) const;
00111 
00118     void coordinatesFromKey(const HashKey key, Point & coordinates) const;
00119 
00125     inline HashKey parentKey(const HashKey key) const
00126     {
00127       return key >> dimension;
00128     }
00129 
00137     void brotherKeys(const HashKey key, HashKey* result ) const;
00138 
00139     
00146     void childrenKeys(const HashKey key, HashKey* result ) const;
00147     
00148   private: 
00149
